summary:
"The Boys" is an Amazon Prime Video show based on a comic book. It's about a group of vigilantes fighting powerful superheroes who work for a big company. The show stars many actors like Karl Urban and Erin Moriarty.

Originally planned as a movie, it became a TV series in 2016. The first season came out in 2019, and it's now in its fifth and final season, expected in 2026. "The Boys" has won many awards and has spin-offs, including animated and other live-action series.
title: The Boys (TV series)
